name: Heck Deck (itch) (torcado)
description:
a bullet hell card game where time only moves when you do

explore 5 different levels with unique themes and music

find tons of attacks and abilities, buy and sell cards at shops

fight dozens of unique enemies and 5 challenging bosses

#1 most innovative and #3 overall game of Ludum Dare 41, expanded upon into a full experience for desktop and mobile

  • supports 12 different languages and includes several accessibility settings
  • includes incredible music by keestak
  • published by PID Games
  • everything else made by torcado :)

join us on discord!
